fields_of_interest: Trade, Competition, International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Transport, Climate Action, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: Environmental and operational initiatives, policies and legislation related to the maritime industry on EU Level as well as regional and local (e.g. port and estruaries) have our focus.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: We are memeber of EGCSA (Exhaust Gas Cleaning System Association) see www.egcsa.com
goals__remit: Clean Marine AS is a corporation that design and build Exhaust Gas Cleaning Systems (EGCS) for the Maritime Industry. The patented Clean Marine EGCS is specifically designed to meet the needs of the maritime industry and offers proven Allstream exhaust gas handling. All exhaust sources on board can be served by one common EGCS unit, enabling a fast return on investment.
relevant_communication:
EU implementation of New SOx, particulatesand NOx reduction policies locally, regionally and on EU Level.  
Discharge to sea in ports and estuaries - and in EU waters in general.
